fields.Title of Presentation: Using Online Teaching Tools in the Face-to-Face Classroom
fields.Conference / Meeting Name: Great Ideas in Teaching & Learning Symposium
fields.Description/Abstract: In addition to teaching 350+ students each fall in our face-to-face UF 100 courses, we have also taught online sections of the course each semester. Many of the skills and tools we created for the online course have been surprisingly beneficial in our face-to-face sections, including communication methods, multimedia resources, self-grading quizzes, online discussions, a robust Blackboard site, and common rubrics across discussion groups. By borrowing from our online course sites and online teaching methods, we have been able to give our on-site students a richer and more interactive learning experience.
